released few days ago and I've to say, it is really cool! It simplifies the configuration to setup MCP Server and seamlessly use MCP Client to leverage the tools hosted on the MCP Server. Whats really nice is that everything is in Mule, no need to go outside. \\\\n\\\\nI wanted to know how it can be used along our MAC Project, so I built a simple AI Agent as you can see in this short demo. \\\\n\\\\n\uD83E\uDDEE \uD835\uDC0C\uD835\uDC02\uD835\uDC0F \uD835\uDC12\uD835\uDC1E\uD835\uDC2B\uD835\uDC2F\uD835\uDC1E\uD835\uDC2B Configuration with get_inventory and get_crm_accounts, incl. their execution.\\\\n\\\\n\uD83D\uDD0C \uD835\uDC0C\uD835\uDC02\uD835\uDC0F
